Mindu

ui/ux design / prototype / logo

Client
Mindu
Deliverables
UI/UX Design, Prototype, Logo
Date
2019 – 2021

Mindu is an educational mobile app prototype that addresses UN Sustainable Development Goal target 3.4 by promoting mental health and well-being. The app takes users through an interactive learning experience while reinforcing material through weekly challenges.

The friendly and minimal design of the Mindu app makes it easy to navigate, allowing many users to learn about their mental health and discover simple ways to improve it through lifestyle and nutrition.
